text: The Boston College Eagles women's lacrosse team is an NCAA Division I college lacrosse team representing Boston College as part of the Atlantic Coast Conference. They play their home games at Newton Soccer Complex in Newton, Massachusetts and occasionally, at Alumni Stadium in Chestnut Hill, Massachusetts. ==Individual career records== Reference: {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:140px; "|Record ! style="width:35px; "|Number ! style="width:140px; "|Player ! style="width:70px; "|Years |- style="text- align:center;" | Goals || 283 || Sam Apuzzo || 2016-2019 |- style="text- align:center;" | Assists || 131 || Kenzie Kent || 2015-2019 |- style="text- align:center;" | Points || 397 || Sam Apuzzo || 2016–2019 |- style="text- align:center;" | Ground balls || 201 || Jacklyn Yovankin || 2002-2005 |- style="text-align:center;" | Draw controls || 458 || Sam Appuzzo || 2016-2019 |- style="text-align:center;" | Saves || 982 || Megan McElvogue || 1994-1997 |} ==Individual single-season records== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:140px; "|Record ! style="width:35px; "|Number ! style="width:140px; "|Player ! style="width:50px; "|Year |- style="text- align:center;" | Goals || 94 || Sam Apuzzo || 2019 |- style="text- align:center;" | Assists || 75 || Kenzie Kent || 2019 |- style="text- align:center;" | Points || 129 || Sam Apuzzo || 2018 |- style="text- align:center;" | Ground balls || 89 || Jacklyn Yovankin || 2003 |- style="text-align:center;" | Draw controls || 191 || Sam Apuzzo || 2019 |- style="text-align:center;" | Saves || 289 || Megan McElvogue || 1997 |- style="text-align:center;" | Save % || .695 || Megan McElvogue || 1995 |} ==Seasons== ==Postseason Results== The Eagles have appeared in 8 NCAA tournaments.
